generatedFromSchema_doNotEdit.title: Entity Aquatic Charge Attack Behavior
generatedFromSchema_doNotEdit.description: Enables an aquatic mob to dash at its target with knockback; includes overshoot and cooldown settings.

fields.title: Attack Reach
fields.description: Horizontal reach grown around the mob's AABB to register a hit. Default value: 0.05.

fields.title: Charge Cooldown Time
fields.description: Range of time in seconds to wait before starting another charge. Default value: [2.0, 6.0].

fields.title: Charge Overshoot Distance
fields.description: Distance beyond the target the mob aims during a charge. Default value: 1.5.

fields.title: Charge Speed Multiplier
fields.description: Speed multiplier applied during the charge. Default value: 10.

fields.title: Knockback Force
fields.description: Knockback force applied to the target on hit. Default value: 2.

fields.title: Max Charge Distance
fields.description: Maximum distance at which the mob attempts a charge. Default value: 16.
